pages.text: There are various useful tools one might run across for exploring.  Here are just a few:
When in the Overworld, this compass will always point towards the origin.$(br2)When in the Nether, this compass will always point towards the Nether Portal from which you entered.

pages.title: Bound Compass
pages.text: This compass will always point towards the beacon it's bound to.$(br2)A bound compass can be acquired by right clicking an active beacon with a compass.
Unlike the normal compass, this one does exactly what you expect a compass to do ... tell you which direction is north.
This handy 'clock' lets you know not what time it is but what season it is.  Useful for farming.
